title: Chase app freezes right when picture app is accessed for depositing a check (Pixel 2)
content:
I've tried to:

Uninstall/Reinstall
Clear cache and storage
Tried to wireless and through 4G
Tried with auto screen rotate off and on

I've deposited checks through the Chase app for a few years now and in the last couple weeks just stopped working. Chase says they don't know what's wrong.
